articles.description: Build-up as England face Bosnia-Herzegovina and Scotland play Gibraltar in Euro 2024 warm-up matches plus football latest including Jose Mourinho joining Fenerbahce.
articles.title: England and Scotland begin Euros warm-up matches & football latest

articles.description: Follow live text and listen to radio commentary from day nine of the French Open at Roland Garros.
articles.title: French Open 2024 LIVE: Sabalenka, Djokovic, Zverev, Rune - scores, results & order of play

articles.description: Rob Burrow: Tributes after Leeds Rhinos and MND campaigner dies aged 41
articles.title: Rob Burrow: Tributes after Leeds Rhinos and MND campaigner dies aged 41

articles.description: World Athletics announces a new global championship to start in 2026 which will feature the sport's biggest prize fund.
articles.title: World Athletics Ultimate Championship: New event with record prize fund to launch in 2026

articles.description: Cole Palmer didn't get on the pitch when Manchester City won the Champions League last June - but now he looks set to play a part at Euro 2024 with England. BBC Sport charts his rise with Chelsea.
articles.title: Cole Palmer: Could Chelsea forward be England's 'secret weapon' at Euros?

articles.description: Julian Nagelsmann condemned the poll, which asked if people wanted more white players on the German team.
articles.title: Julian Nagelsmann: German football coach condemns broadcaster's 'racist' survey

articles.description: A champion on and off the field, Rob Burrow's determination, courage and humility ensures a legacy that stretches way beyond rugby league.
articles.title: Rob Burrow dies: Leeds rugby league great and MND campaigner

articles.description: Scotland's Robert MacIntyre, with his dad Dougie as caddie, wins his first PGA Tour title at the Canadian Open.
articles.title: Canadian Open: Robert MacIntyre wins first PGA Tour title with dad as caddie

articles.description: Security is tightened before the first T20 World Cup match in New York, including positioning police snipers at covert locations around the stadium.
articles.title: T20 World Cup: New York cricket stadium for India v Pakistan to have police snipers
